text: Are you looking for a way to save money on food delivery? Free Uber Eats gift cards might be just what you need. You can take surveys, play… Are you looking for a way to save money on food delivery? Free Uber Eats gift cards might be just what you need. These free gift cards can help you enjoy tasty meals without spending your own cash. There are several ways to get free Uber Eats gift cards online. You can take surveys, play games, or shop through certain websites. Some sites even give you points for watching videos or trying new products. I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using the platforms listed below, and it’s an easy way to get free Uber Eats gift cards. Quick note: If you’re a new user, you can sign up for Uber Eats here and get $20 off each of your first 2 Uber Eats orders over $25. Best Ways To Get a Free Uber Eats Gift Card Here’s a quick list before we begin: Freecash Swagbucks Branded Surveys Fetch Rewards Ibotta Upside Survey Junkie MyPoints InboxDollars PrizeRebel Ipsos iSay Honey Uber Eats referral program Below are the best ways to get a free Uber Eats gift card. Proof that I’ve made money playing games on Freecash. The $0.05 amounts were rewards for playing 2 minutes each day. The larger amounts like $40, $70, and $150 were for reaching certain levels. I turned my points in all for free Amazon gift cards, but you can easily redeem them for Uber Eats gift cards too. 1. Freecash Freecash is a fun way to make some extra money online. I have received many free gift cards using this site and it’s easy! You can play games, download apps, answer surveys, and more in order to earn free Uber Eats gift cards. Some people make $10 or more every day on Freecash. Plus, you can cash out your earnings fast. You can get PayPal money, gift cards, or even cryptocurrency. Freecash has free Uber Eats gift cards in amounts ranging from $15 to $100, and there is no fee to withdraw your points. I have personally made $302 just by playing a game on Freecash on my phone, and it only took one week. I turned it into free gift cards. Click here to sign up for Freecash. Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit? I’ve received over 100 gift cards from Swagbucks, as you can see in this screenshot. 2. Swagbucks Swagbucks is a fun way to get free Uber Eats gift cards. You can do many things to earn points called SB. These include taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games. You can also shop online and get cash back. Swagbucks even lets you earn points for searching the web. I’ve done a little bit of everything to earn points on Swagbucks over the years, and I can truthfully say that it is an easy site to use and earn points on. Once you have enough SB, you can trade them for gift cards. These include Uber Eats (you can get Uber Eats gift cards in amounts such as $25, $50, and $100), Amazon, and more. You can also get PayPal cash if you prefer. I have received over 110 free gift cards on Swagbucks over the years, so I know this is real! Sign up for Swagbucks here (and earn $5 in free bonus points). Recommended reading: Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks? 3. Branded Surveys Branded Surveys is a good way to get free Uber Eats gift cards. You can join for free and start taking surveys right away. Every survey you finish earns you points and these points can be traded for gift cards. The surveys are pretty easy. They might ask about things you like or products you use. Most take 5-20 minutes to finish. Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus. Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn 4. Fetch Rewards Fetch Rewards is an easy app where you can earn free Uber Eats gift cards. It’s super easy to use! All you need to do is take pictures of your receipts with your phone. I use Fetch Rewards for all of my grocery receipts, and I think it’s an easy app to use. You can scan receipts from almost any store. This includes grocery stores, gas stations, and even restaurants. Every time you scan a receipt, you earn points. Using Fetch Rewards is simple. Just shop like you normally do, then take a picture of your receipt when you’re done. The app does the rest! You can earn extra points by checking out special offers in the app. These offers can give you more points for buying certain items, like a specific brand of bread or soap. You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here. Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review 5. Ibotta Ibotta is a free app that can help you save money on groceries and other purchases. You can earn cash back on items you buy at many stores. It’s a lot like Fetch Rewards, and I personally like to use both of these apps on the same receipts (it gives you more chances to earn points!). Here’s how it works: Before you shop, check the Ibotta app for offers. Add the ones you want to your list. Then, go shopping as usual. After you’re done, take a picture of your receipt with the app. Ibotta will match your purchases to the offers you picked. You’ll get cash back for the items that match. You can then turn the points you’ve earned into free gift cards, such as to Uber Eats. You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here. 6. Upside Upside is a free app that helps you save money on everyday purchases, such as gas for your car. With Upside, you can earn around 25 cents back per gallon of gas, and sometimes even up to 90 cents per gallon. Using the app is easy. Just sign up, find offers near you, and claim them before you buy gas. You can use Upside at many popular gas stations like BP, Shell, and Circle K. It also works at some grocery stores and restaurants. The app is available in most big cities across the U.S. When you’re ready to get your money, you can choose PayPal, a bank transfer, or gift cards. You can sign up for Upside by clicking here. 7. Survey Junkie Survey Junkie is a fun way to get free Uber Eats gift cards. You can share your thoughts and earn points at the same time. How does it work? You answer questions about products and services. Each survey gives you points. When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. Sign up for Survey Junkie here. Recommended reading: Survey Junkie Review 8. MyPoints MyPoints is a fun way to earn free Uber Eats gift cards. You can get points for shopping online, answering surveys, playing games, and more. When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. Uber Eats is one of the many options available. You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here. 9. InboxDollars InboxDollars is a website that pays you for doing simple online tasks. You can earn money by taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games. Some of the games you can play include Monopoly, Animals & Coins, Tile Busters, and more. One great thing about InboxDollars is that you can get free Uber Eats gift cards. Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus. 10. PrizeRebel PrizeRebel is a website where you can earn free Uber Eats gift cards by taking surveys, signing up for offers, and watching videos. When you have enough points, you can trade them for an Uber Eats gift card. You can also choose other rewards like PayPal cash or gift cards from other brands. I have received several free gift cards from PrizeRebel over the years, and they send you the free gift card code fast! Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here. 11. Ipsos iSay Ipsos iSay is a survey website where you can earn rewards for sharing your thoughts. It’s easy to use and free to join. Once you’re signed up, you’ll get emails about new surveys. These emails tell you how long the survey takes and how many points you can earn. The surveys ask about things like what you buy and what you think of new products. Sometimes you might not qualify for a survey, but don’t worry as there are always more chances to earn. When you finish surveys, you get points. You can trade these points for gift cards or cash, such as free Uber Eats gift cards. Please click here to sign up for Ipsos iSay and get a free 250 points for joining. Recommended reading: Ipsos iSay Review 12. Honey Honey is a free tool that can help you save money when you shop online. It’s a browser add-on that works with popular web browsers like Chrome and Firefox. When you’re about to buy something, Honey searches for discount codes and applies the best one to your cart. You don’t have to do any extra work. Honey does it all for you. It looks for deals at over 30,000 stores, so there’s a good chance it can help you save on your favorite brands. Another neat thing about Honey is that you can earn rewards points when you shop. These points can be traded for gift cards to Uber Eats. You can learn more about Honey by clicking here. 13. Uber Eats referrals Uber Eats has a referral program where you can get Uber Eats credits to put toward your Uber Eats order. When you share your referral link with friends, you both win. Right now, you can give $40 to a friend and get $15 back. Here are the official terms: “You get $15 off $25 minimum order (excluding promotions) • Promotion applies to delivery orders only. They get $40 off ($20 off 2 orders) • $25 minimum order (excluding promotions) • Promotion applies to delivery orders only.” You can find your referral code/link in the Uber Eats app or on their website after you log in. Here’s my referral link so that you can sign up and see (and you can also get free Uber Eats credit!). Frequently Asked Questions Below are answers to common questions about how to get a free Uber Eats gift card. How to get free money for Uber Eats? You can get free Uber Eats credit by sharing your invite code with friends. When a new user orders for the first time with your code, you’ll get a promo to use on your next order. You can also get free money for Uber Eats by downloading apps such as Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards and earning points. What are some legit ways to get Uber Eats promo codes? There are many legit ways to get Uber Eats promo codes, such as referring new users to Uber Eats, as well as earning points on apps like Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards. Can you really get free gift card codes for Uber Eats online? Yes, you can really get free gift card codes for Uber Eats online, but I recommend that you, of course, be careful of scams. Legit ways to get free Uber Eats gift cards include using reward apps like Freecash and Ibotta. These let you earn points by shopping, watching videos, completing surveys, or doing tasks. You can then trade your points for Uber Eats gift cards. Is it possible to earn Uber Eats gift cards by taking surveys? Many survey sites have Uber Eats gift cards as a reward option, so yes, it is possible. Popular choices include Survey Junkie, Swagbucks, and Branded Surveys. You answer questions about products and services to earn points, and then trade your points for Uber Eats gift cards. How to avoid scams when looking for free Uber Eats gift card codes To avoid scams when looking for free Uber Eats gift card codes, I recommend that you stick to trusted apps and sites to earn rewards. Don’t give out personal info to sketchy websites promising free codes for nothing, as those are most likely scams. If an offer seems too good to be true, it probably is. Are you looking for a way to save money on food delivery? Free Uber Eats gift cards might be just what you need. These free gift cards can help you enjoy tasty meals without spending your own cash.

There are several ways to get free Uber Eats gift cards online. You can take surveys, play games, or shop through certain websites. Some sites even give you points for watching videos or trying new products.

I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using the platforms listed below, and it’s an easy way to get free Uber Eats gift cards.

Quick note: If you’re a new user, you can sign up for Uber Eats here and get $20 off each of your first 2 Uber Eats orders over $25.

Best Ways To Get a Free Uber Eats Gift Card

Here’s a quick list before we begin:

  • Freecash
  • Swagbucks
  • Branded Surveys
  • Fetch Rewards
  • Ibotta
  • Upside
  • Survey Junkie
  • MyPoints
  • InboxDollars
  • PrizeRebel

  • Uber Eats referral program

Below are the best ways to get a free Uber Eats gift card.

1. Freecash

Freecash is a fun way to make some extra money online. I have received many free gift cards using this site and it’s easy!

You can play games, download apps, answer surveys, and more in order to earn free Uber Eats gift cards. Some people make $10 or more every day on Freecash.

Plus, you can cash out your earnings fast. You can get PayPal money, gift cards, or even cryptocurrency. Freecash has free Uber Eats gift cards in amounts ranging from $15 to $100, and there is no fee to withdraw your points.

I have personally made $302 just by playing a game on Freecash on my phone, and it only took one week. I turned it into free gift cards.

Click here to sign up for Freecash.

Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit?

2. Swagbucks

Swagbucks is a fun way to get free Uber Eats gift cards. You can do many things to earn points called SB. These include taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games.

You can also shop online and get cash back. Swagbucks even lets you earn points for searching the web. I’ve done a little bit of everything to earn points on Swagbucks over the years, and I can truthfully say that it is an easy site to use and earn points on.

Once you have enough SB, you can trade them for gift cards. These include Uber Eats (you can get Uber Eats gift cards in amounts such as $25, $50, and $100), Amazon, and more. You can also get PayPal cash if you prefer.

I have received over 110 free gift cards on Swagbucks over the years, so I know this is real!

Sign up for Swagbucks here (and earn $5 in free bonus points).

Recommended reading: Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks?

3. Branded Surveys

Branded Surveys is a good way to get free Uber Eats gift cards. You can join for free and start taking surveys right away.

Every survey you finish earns you points and these points can be traded for gift cards.

The surveys are pretty easy. They might ask about things you like or products you use. Most take 5-20 minutes to finish.

Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus.

Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn

4. Fetch Rewards

Fetch Rewards is an easy app where you can earn free Uber Eats gift cards. It’s super easy to use! All you need to do is take pictures of your receipts with your phone.

I use Fetch Rewards for all of my grocery receipts, and I think it’s an easy app to use.

You can scan receipts from almost any store. This includes grocery stores, gas stations, and even restaurants. Every time you scan a receipt, you earn points.

Using Fetch Rewards is simple. Just shop like you normally do, then take a picture of your receipt when you’re done. The app does the rest!

You can earn extra points by checking out special offers in the app. These offers can give you more points for buying certain items, like a specific brand of bread or soap.

You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here.

Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review

5. Ibotta

Ibotta is a free app that can help you save money on groceries and other purchases. You can earn cash back on items you buy at many stores. It’s a lot like Fetch Rewards, and I personally like to use both of these apps on the same receipts (it gives you more chances to earn points!).

Here’s how it works: Before you shop, check the Ibotta app for offers. Add the ones you want to your list. Then, go shopping as usual.

After you’re done, take a picture of your receipt with the app. Ibotta will match your purchases to the offers you picked. You’ll get cash back for the items that match.

You can then turn the points you’ve earned into free gift cards, such as to Uber Eats.

You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here.

6. Upside

Upside is a free app that helps you save money on everyday purchases, such as gas for your car. With Upside, you can earn around 25 cents back per gallon of gas, and sometimes even up to 90 cents per gallon.

Using the app is easy. Just sign up, find offers near you, and claim them before you buy gas.

You can use Upside at many popular gas stations like BP, Shell, and Circle K. It also works at some grocery stores and restaurants. The app is available in most big cities across the U.S.

When you’re ready to get your money, you can choose PayPal, a bank transfer, or gift cards.

You can sign up for Upside by clicking here.

7. Survey Junkie

Survey Junkie is a fun way to get free Uber Eats gift cards. You can share your thoughts and earn points at the same time.

How does it work? You answer questions about products and services. Each survey gives you points. When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards.

Sign up for Survey Junkie here.

Recommended reading: Survey Junkie Review

8. MyPoints

MyPoints is a fun way to earn free Uber Eats gift cards. You can get points for shopping online, answering surveys, playing games, and more.

When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. Uber Eats is one of the many options available.

You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here.

9. InboxDollars

InboxDollars is a website that pays you for doing simple online tasks. You can earn money by taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games. Some of the games you can play include Monopoly, Animals & Coins, Tile Busters, and more.

One great thing about InboxDollars is that you can get free Uber Eats gift cards.

Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus.

10. PrizeRebel

PrizeRebel is a website where you can earn free Uber Eats gift cards by taking surveys, signing up for offers, and watching videos.

When you have enough points, you can trade them for an Uber Eats gift card. You can also choose other rewards like PayPal cash or gift cards from other brands.

I have received several free gift cards from PrizeRebel over the years, and they send you the free gift card code fast!

Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here.

11. Ipsos iSay

Ipsos iSay is a survey website where you can earn rewards for sharing your thoughts. It’s easy to use and free to join.

Once you’re signed up, you’ll get emails about new surveys. These emails tell you how long the survey takes and how many points you can earn.

The surveys ask about things like what you buy and what you think of new products. Sometimes you might not qualify for a survey, but don’t worry as there are always more chances to earn.

When you finish surveys, you get points. You can trade these points for gift cards or cash, such as free Uber Eats gift cards.

Please click here to sign up for Ipsos iSay and get a free 250 points for joining.

Recommended reading: Ipsos iSay Review

12. Honey

Honey is a free tool that can help you save money when you shop online. It’s a browser add-on that works with popular web browsers like Chrome and Firefox. When you’re about to buy something, Honey searches for discount codes and applies the best one to your cart.

You don’t have to do any extra work. Honey does it all for you. It looks for deals at over 30,000 stores, so there’s a good chance it can help you save on your favorite brands.

Another neat thing about Honey is that you can earn rewards points when you shop. These points can be traded for gift cards to Uber Eats.

You can learn more about Honey by clicking here.

13. Uber Eats referrals

Uber Eats has a referral program where you can get Uber Eats credits to put toward your Uber Eats order. When you share your referral link with friends, you both win.

Right now, you can give $40 to a friend and get $15 back.

Here are the official terms: “You get $15 off $25 minimum order (excluding promotions) • Promotion applies to delivery orders only. They get $40 off ($20 off 2 orders) • $25 minimum order (excluding promotions) • Promotion applies to delivery orders only.”

You can find your referral code/link in the Uber Eats app or on their website after you log in.

Here’s my referral link so that you can sign up and see (and you can also get free Uber Eats credit!).

Frequently Asked Questions

Below are answers to common questions about how to get a free Uber Eats gift card.

How to get free money for Uber Eats?

You can get free Uber Eats credit by sharing your invite code with friends. When a new user orders for the first time with your code, you’ll get a promo to use on your next order. You can also get free money for Uber Eats by downloading apps such as Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards and earning points.

What are some legit ways to get Uber Eats promo codes?

There are many legit ways to get Uber Eats promo codes, such as referring new users to Uber Eats, as well as earning points on apps like Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards.

Can you really get free gift card codes for Uber Eats online?

Yes, you can really get free gift card codes for Uber Eats online, but I recommend that you, of course, be careful of scams. Legit ways to get free Uber Eats gift cards include using reward apps like Freecash and Ibotta. These let you earn points by shopping, watching videos, completing surveys, or doing tasks. You can then trade your points for Uber Eats gift cards.

Is it possible to earn Uber Eats gift cards by taking surveys?

Many survey sites have Uber Eats gift cards as a reward option, so yes, it is possible. Popular choices include Survey Junkie, Swagbucks, and Branded Surveys. You answer questions about products and services to earn points, and then trade your points for Uber Eats gift cards.

How to avoid scams when looking for free Uber Eats gift card codes

To avoid scams when looking for free Uber Eats gift card codes, I recommend that you stick to trusted apps and sites to earn rewards. Don’t give out personal info to sketchy websites promising free codes for nothing, as those are most likely scams. If an offer seems too good to be true, it probably is.

How To Get a Free Uber Eats Gift Card – Summary

I hope you enjoyed my article on how to get a free Uber Eats gift card.

If you’re looking to save money on food delivery, getting free Uber Eats gift cards is a great option. There are several easy ways to earn these gift cards, such as taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online through specific apps and websites.

These methods are simple and only take a few minutes each day, making it possible to enjoy your favorite meals without spending your own money.

In summary, getting free Uber Eats gift cards is completely doable – I’ve done it myself! Using sites like Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards, I’ve earned over $1,000 in free gift cards to different retailers.

What is your favorite way to get free Uber Eats gift cards?
